data.title: The Devil's Mistress
data.text:
Berlin, 1934. The ambitious, and very beautiful young Czech actress Lída Baarová is about to launch her career in the German Reich at Berlin‘s Babelsberg Film Studios – a dream come true. But how long will this dream last when she decides to become a mistress of the Nazi Minister of Propaganda Joseph Goebbels? How could one of Europe's most glamorous actresses reject offers from Hollywood in preference to a dangerous romance with the Nazi monster with a deformed leg?

Cast / Anna Fialová , Pavel Kříž , Lenka Vlasáková , Hana Vagnerová , Jiří Mádl , Kateřina Klausová , Tatiana Pauhofová , Karl Markovics , Gedeon Burkhard , Zdenka Procházková , Martin Huba , Simona Stašová Writer / Ivan Hubač DoP / Petr Hojda Editor / Luděk Hudec Sound / Martin Ženíšek , Michal Deliopulos Music / Ondřej Soukup Costumes / Jan Růžička Make-Up / Jana Radilová Set Designer / Zdeněk Flemming
